slide1.title: Welcome to Archway Wallet
slide1.subtitle: A cutting-edge new wallet that combines the highest level of protection with a sleek, modern design giving you complete control over your digital assets.

slide2.title: Rewarding Architects of Web3
slide2.subtitle: Archway ensures that dapp developers receive their fair share of rewards and incentives by baking network-level rewards directly into the protocol itself.

slide3.title: Launchpad Into the Multichain
slide3.subtitle: Built on Cosmos, the protocol enables dapps to plug directly into a vast multi-chain ecosystem, reaching as many users and assets as possible.

SetupOptions.title: Account Setup
SetupOptions.subtitle: Create a new wallet or import an existing one.
